comment: This professor is great I took the class online she doesn't really respond to emails but the work is pretty straightforward. You have 2 mandatory performances to go to on the Marietta campus and an essay about them but she's a super easy grader. You also have to submit infographics and videos of you dancing.

Only complaint is that she doesn't respond to emails in a timely manner. She even ignored all 3 emails about grading my discussion post I missed while sick. So, I just didn't receive a grade for it. 2 major essays with dance performance, discussions, and dance video assignment. Responses to discussion can be short, easy 100's.

She's a 10/10 professor. 

1. Discussion post
2. Two papers (on the dance performances that you MUST attend for a grade)'
3. Dance recordings (trust me it's not bad at all so don't overthink it) 

TAKE HER!! Easy A.

It was an easy class, but the discussions were annoying because you had to create a visual aid through Canva or PowerPoint instead of just writing the discussion. Attended 2 performances where you had to write an essay after, exams are locked down, but no webcam, and there are time-lapse assignments where you film yourself dancing.

Her class is so easyy (online at least), she has like 6 time lapses that are super easy to complete and the rest of the work are discussions. There are 3 exams open notes and two performances to attend. Take her. I did hear she wasn't rlly that accessible outside of class though.

Professor Dunn was great! She was super understanding and you only had to attend two performances, do like 5 time lapses of you following a dance and a discussion every week. I took it as an elective and it was stress-free!

Very easy class to follow and perform in. Dr. Dunn was very responsive to grading and was easy on grading. Have to use some creativity on assignments but not too bad since she was lenient with the assignments especially writing ones. She also understood people take the class for graduation credit and gave good feedback on all assignments.

Super easy class and nice teacher. She offered lots of extra credit. You have to attend two dances to observe and 2 to participate in but you can do it online. Overall class was fun and easiest class i've taken took me about 45 min out of the whole week
There are weekly readings, discussions, and like 3 tests. This class is not hard just make sure you stay on top of the assignments.
Easy class. Weekly online lectures an d quizzes. Easy class to take. Take her.

I took her class for Dance in Society. She did make us participate in actual dances but only twice and it was actually fun! We have 2 or 3 quizzes and weekly discussions that aren't difficult. Take her if you want an easy A.

Professor Dunn is great! I took her online for dance in society and this class was very easy. The only hard thing we had to do was attend two dance performances and write reviews on them. There are weekly discussion and a few quizzes.That being said the performances were very good. I recommend her if you want an easy A!
